text:
If the MS-IExplorer will get an pdf-file the browser prompmts

Datei beginnt nicht mit "%PDF-"

after ok. and actualise opens the acrobate.

The thame pages published with w2k and MS-presentation manager works very
well.Also with mozilla no problems.
creator: albrecht@rz.uni-potsdam.de

text:
This is a known explorer bug/race condition. Try setting downgrade-1.0 and
force-response-1.0 variables for MSIE.
creator: nd@perlig.de
nick@webthing.com
